alert.note: Alert for Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 8:16PM EST until March 09 at 5:31PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Scioto River at Circleville. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Scioto River at Circleville. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Low-lying agricultural and bottom land becomes flooded, while flooding begins along Island and Canal Roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Tuesday morning to a crest of 15.6 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
